name: Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 1.5 Dai-4-Wa: Adam no Namida
name_original: Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 1.5 Dai-4-Wa: Adam no Namida
description:
Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 1.5 Dai-4-Wa: Adam no Namida is an action game. It was originally released in 2012.
You can play Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 1.5 Dai-4-Wa: Adam no Namida on PSP.
